code: import React from'react';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import fire from'../util/firebase';export default function Task(_ref){var task=_ref.task;var deleteTask=function deleteTask(){var taskRef=fire.database().ref('Task').child(task.id);taskRef.remove();};var completeTask=function completeTask(){var taskRef=fire.database().ref('Task').child(task.id);taskRef.update({complete:!task.complete});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{class:task.complete?"complete":""},task.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"secondary",onClick:deleteTask},"Delete"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{variant:"contained",className:"completebtn",onClick:completeTask},"Complete"));};
